##### deployment
- completely handled by Aman

### running local
###### changes in .env.local
- update to latest library version and token
###### changes in `index.html`
- change token, url and clientType
```javascript
      var clientType = "CONSOLE";
      // var clientType = localStorage.getItem("clientType");
      var url = "https://cloud.dev.apps.yokogawa.build";
      // var url = window.location.origin;
      // const token = localStorage.getItem("access_token");
      const token = "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImtpZCI6ImRlOTc4OGVjLWJmMWQtNGMzMy1iMTEyLTgyMDk5Njc5MGY3YiJ9..JasXH2RKW_SoPIx1LprzHg5uR_HaTs3tyfQ_tsuc3GK075bHiFmAQJDBdBy5BbR2B2eJUPDmjAGbwazS6q7aOAD-x1yjs0dkEp2huxPPuarCY2Ym8NdPAU6_DPThhHsIjH0LwklqODX0ovslyqcS-FZTUQ90wC6Xuz_hSqy-ryTV-2-Et8BFBJMRZ0-gtJuaipcvssO0OD4A1lrH2nkDT0GFlONl6_TCdpkhWJX8inXK5IZ1Ecovo26c8RT_d5Q3x4mK5b0XAQiYZx4ik9tflwD2F13j0_rHgY_HXC61jQUowZl3DToafFW3x0fw3gESZOrEYGi11tdT_gk5lzHRgw"

```

##### changes in `index.js/homepage`
- more or less the same changes as index.html
```javascript
    // const accessToken = localStorage.getItem(stringConstant.accessToken);
    const accessToken =  "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImtpZCI6ImRlOTc4OGVjLWJmMWQtNGMzMy1iMTEyLTgyMDk5Njc5MGY3YiJ9..JasXH2RKW_SoPIx1LprzHg5uR_HaTs3tyfQ_tsuc3GK075bHiFmAQJDBdBy5BbR2B2eJUPDmjAGbwazS6q7aOAD-x1yjs0dkEp2huxPPuarCY2Ym8NdPAU6_DPThhHsIjH0LwklqODX0ovslyqcS-FZTUQ90wC6Xuz_hSqy-ryTV-2-Et8BFBJMRZ0-gtJuaipcvssO0OD4A1lrH2nkDT0GFlONl6_TCdpkhWJX8inXK5IZ1Ecovo26c8RT_d5Q3x4mK5b0XAQiYZx4ik9tflwD2F13j0_rHgY_HXC61jQUowZl3DToafFW3x0fw3gESZOrEYGi11tdT_gk5lzHRgw";

    var windowOrigin =  "https://cloud.dev.apps.yokogawa.build";
```
